IPC-IV Social Activities

Conference Banquet at the Willow Tree

Tuesday dinner, 6:00pm.
Estimated price: $20, due at registration.

The Willow Tree is located at the end of Regional Street. To get there from the Holiday Inn you go North on Foothill, cross over 580, take the first right. The very next right is Regional, and you go to the end of the cul-de-sac where the Willow Tree is on the left center. The total distance from the hotel is half a mile or less. The Willow Tree has its back to 580. 

                                         | Hotel /||\
       ---------------------Foothill-----|--------||--------|------
                                                 \||/       |
                                                5 ||  WT<---+------ Regional
                                                8 ||        |
                                                0 ||

Luncheon at the Retzlaff Vineyards

Wednesday lunch, 12:00 Noon.
Estimated price: $10 + drinks.

Retzlaff is a family run vineyard specializing in creating prize-winning wines which can compete on a world-class basis. They have been operating for ten years. The winery provides a high-class restaurant and special social events.


Map to Retzlaff Vineyards
